title: "MediaTek unveils Dimensity 1000C 5G chip"
excerpt: "MediaTek has announced its latest 5G smartphone chip, the Dimensity 1000C. The 7 nm chip features four Arm-Cortex-A77 CPU cores and four power-efficient Arm Cortex-A55 cores operating up to 2 GHz. MediaTek said the chip will first be used in the recently announced LG Velvet,"
